site_name: Pocklington Lodge Rylett RoadLondonW12 9PQ
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Neighbouring garden (302 Goldhawk Road):1 Various x 1: 1 x Holly tree and some ivy overhanging the property - Reduce overhanging branches back to the boundary line - Reduce overhanging Ivy back to the wall.Rear garden of property on site: T1 Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Reduce crown height by 3 - 3.5m - Reduce crown sides by 2m- Retain as much furnishing growth as possible to aid a healthy recovery. Neighbouring garden T2 Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Reduce crown back to the boundary line by as much as possible (2m)Front garden (Rylett road): G2	Silver Birch x 3 (Betula pendula / alba) - Reduce all aspects of the crowns by up to 2mFront garden (Goldhawk road): G3 Silver Birch x 6 (Betula pendula /alba) - Reduce all aspects of the crowns by 1.5 - 2m
